description: This source file defines a utility object StringUtils that provides functions for joining a linked list into a string and splitting a string into a linked list, relying on external utility classes JoinUtils and SplitUtils.

classes.name: StringUtils
classes.description: A utility singleton object providing string manipulation functions using linked lists.

methods.name: join
methods.description: Converts a LinkedList into a String by delegating to JoinUtils.join.

methods.name: split
methods.description: Splits a String into a LinkedList by delegating to SplitUtils.split.
